title: Wonder Woman v2 8-24 (1987) (digital) (DreamGirl-Novus) [NVS-D]
description:
English | CBZ | 17 Issues

Wonder Woman v2 #8-24
Publisher:  DC Comics
Publication Date:  September 1987 - December 1988

Writers:  George Perez (#8-24) and Len Wein (#8-16)
Penciller:  George Perez
Inkers:  Bruce Patterson (#8-14), Bob Smith (#15), Dick Giordano (#16-18), Frank McLaughlin (#19), Bob McLeod (#20-22), and Will Blyberg (#23-24)
Colorist:  Tatjana Wood (#8-9), Carl Gafford (#10-24)
Letterers:  John Costanaza (#8-24) and L.S. Macintosh (#8)
Covers:  George Perez

Wonder Woman: Challenge of the Gods story arc (#8-14)
The women in Wonder Woman's life share their views on the Amazon Princess and her recent arrival to Man's World. Julia Kapatelis, Etta Candy, Myndi Mayer and Vanessa Kapatelis all tell their tales!

Wonder Woman: Beauty and the Beasts story arc (#15-19)
Wonder Woman's attempts at adjusting to Man's World lead her to have very strange dreams about a certain Man of Steel. To make matters worse, the Silver Swan crashes the Wonder Woman Fair!

Wonder Woman: Destiny Calling story arc (#20-24)
Who killed Myndi Mayer?! When Wonder Woman's publicist is found shot to death, the Amazon Princess begins a crusade to find her friend's killer and bring them to justice--but the answers Diana seeks might be more than she can bear.

Thanks goes to DreamGirl for this release.
